#summary A quick list of PsyMP3's mention by other sites.
#labels Publicity

= Introduction =

As time goes on, many websites have gained word of PsyMP3, and while most of them just steal content for some download page, as most of them are so-called "download warehouses", a la C|NET Download.com and Softpedia, some of them are blogposts and discussions.

This includes a short, almost guaranteed to be incomplete list of such download pages and other references.
